Package com.salesforce.androidsdk.ui

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    OAuthWebviewHelper.OAuthWebviewHelperEvents
    the host activity/fragment should pass in an implementation of this interface so that it can notify it of things it needs to do as part of the oauth process.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AccountSwitcherActivity
    This class provides UI to switch between existing signed in user accounts, or add a new account.
    CustomServerUrlEditor
    Custom dialog fragment to allow the user to set a label and URL to use for the login.
    FingerprintAuthDialogFragment
    A dialog which uses Fingerprint APIs to authenticate the user, and falls back to password authentication if fingerprint is not available.
    LoginActivity
    Login Activity: takes care of authenticating the user.
    ManageSpaceActivity
    Displays an activity that gives the user the option to clear app data and log out, or cancel the clear user data option.
    OAuthWebviewHelper
    Helper class to manage a WebView instance that is going through the OAuth login process.
    OAuthWebviewHelper.AccountOptions
    Class encapsulating the parameters required to create a new account
    PasscodeActivity
    Passcode activity: takes care of creating/verifying a user passcode.
    SalesforceAccountRadioButton
    Custom radio button implementation to represent a Salesforce account.
    SalesforceActivity
    Abstract base class for all Salesforce activities.
    SalesforceExpandableListActivity
    Abstract base class for all Salesforce expandable list activities.
    SalesforceListActivity
    Abstract base class for all Salesforce list activities.
    SalesforceR
    Before 1.3, SalesforceSDK was packaged as a jar which can't have resources.
    SalesforceServerRadioButton
    Custom radio button implementation to represent a Salesforce custom server endpoint.
    ServerPickerActivity
    This class provides UI to change the login server URL to use during an OAuth flow.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    PasscodeActivity.PasscodeMode
